sn55.25:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato hoti.
sn55.25:1.5: Tatra sudaṃ sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti:
sn55.25:1.7: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.25:1.8: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato.
sn55.25:1.12: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.25:2.4: Tatra sudaṃ, bhante, sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti:
sn55.25:2.6: Ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati.
sn55.25:2.7: Yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato.
sn55.25:3.1: “Yo so, mahānāma, dīgharattaṃ upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, so kathaṃ vinipātaṃ gaccheyya.
sn55.25:3.2: Yañhi taṃ, mahānāma, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn55.25:3.3: ‘dīgharattaṃ upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato’, saraṇāniṃ sakkaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyya.
sn55.25:3.4: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko dīgharattaṃ upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, so kathaṃ vinipātaṃ gaccheyya.
sn55.25:4.1: Idha, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:4.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:4.6: So āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
sn55.25:4.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:5.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:5.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:5.5: hāsapañño javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.25:5.6: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti, upahaccaparinibbāyī hoti, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti, uddhaṃsoto hoti akaniṭṭhagāmī.
sn55.25:5.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:6.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:6.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:6.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.25:6.6: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
sn55.25:6.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:7.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:7.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.25:7.5: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato.
sn55.25:7.6: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.25:7.7: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
sn55.25:8.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno …pe…
sn55.25:8.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato;
sn55.25:8.7: Tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamanti.
sn55.25:8.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṃ agantā tiracchānayoniṃ agantā pettivisayaṃ agantā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ.
sn55.25:9.1: Idha pana, mahānāma, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno …
sn55.25:9.4: na hāsapañño na javanapañño na ca vimuttiyā samannāgato;
sn55.25:9.8: Ayampi kho, mahānāma, puggalo agantā nirayaṃ agantā tiracchānayoniṃ agantā pettivisayaṃ agantā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ.
sn55.25:10.1: Seyyathāpi, mahānāma, dukkhettaṃ dubbhūmaṃ avihatakhāṇukaṃ, bījāni cassu khaṇḍāni pūtīni vātātapahatāni asārādāni asukhasayitāni, devo ca na sammā dhāraṃ anuppaveccheyya.
sn55.25:10.2: Api nu tāni bījāni vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn55.25:10.4: “Evameva kho, mahānāma, idha dhammo durakkhāto hoti duppavedito aniyyāniko anupasamasaṃvattaniko asammāsambuddhappavedito—
sn55.25:10.6: Tasmiñca dhamme sāvako viharati dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī—
sn55.25:11.1: Seyyathāpi, mahānāma, sukhettaṃ subhūmaṃ suvihatakhāṇukaṃ, bījāni cassu akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni sārādāni sukhasayitāni;
sn55.25:11.3: Api nu tāni bījāni vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjeyyun”ti?
sn55.25:11.5: “Evameva kho, mahānāma, idha dhammo svākkhāto hoti suppavedito niyyāniko upasamasaṃvattaniko sammāsambuddhappavedito—
sn55.25:11.7: Tasmiñca dhamme sāvako viharati dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī—
sn55.25:11.10: Saraṇāni, mahānāma, sakko maraṇakāle sikkhāya paripūrakārī ahosī”ti.
